title: Fawad condoles demise of veteran actor Abid Farooq
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 15 (APP): Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain Wednesday expressed grief and sorrow over the demise of renowned actor Abid Farooq alias Baghi.
In a condolence message, he prayed Allah Almighty for high ranks of the departed soul and patience to the bereaved family.
Abid Farooq was a columnist and analyst who was known for his unique style of analysis, said the minister.
